SELECT Ast.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,Ast.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,Ast.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,Ast.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode ,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE AS weightCode ,Dfe.FEATURE_NAME AS productSpec ,E.NORMS_OUT AS pkgSpec ,E.NORMS_CODE AS pkgCode ,E.NETWEIGHT_OUT AS netWeight ,CONCAT(Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE) AS productCode ,CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME,'/',Dfe.FEATURE_NAME,'/',Ast.WEIGHT_NAME) AS productName FROM PD_WEIGHT AS Ast INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_NORMS_STD E ON (SELECT s.STANDARD_ID FROM pd_standard s WHERE s.CLASSESTREE_CODE = CONCAT(Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE)) = E.STANDARD_ID ORDER BY Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE,E.NORMS_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PD_WEIGHT AS Ast INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_NORMS_STD E ON (SELECT s.STANDARD_ID FROM pd_standard s WHERE s.CLASSESTREE_CODE = CONCAT(Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE)) = E.STANDARD_ID
